snippet: With the uncertainty surrounding the Japanese pitcher Masahiro Tanaka, the Yankees have had preliminary discussions with the agents for Johan Santana and Mike Pelfrey.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; New York Yankees, facing uncertainty surrounding Japanese pitcher Masahiro Tanaka, have preliminary discussions with former New York Mets hurlers Johan Santana and Mike Pelfrey; other MLB news noted.
lead_paragraph: With the uncertainty surrounding the Japanese pitcher Masahiro Tanaka, the Yankees have had preliminary discussions with the agents for Johan Santana and Mike Pelfrey.

headline.main: Two Ex-Mets Getting Look From Yankees
headline.print_headline: Two Ex-Mets Getting Look From Yankees
